title: You Can Heal Your Life
author: louise-hay
summary: A self-help book exploring the connection between mind, body, and health. Hay presents the idea that our thoughts and beliefs contribute to our physical ailments and that we can heal through affirmations and positive thinking.

images.alt: You can heal your life cover

attribution.note: Book data from Open Library (openlibrary.org), part of Internet Archive.

description: This book offers practical steps for dissolving both the fears and the causations of diseases. It helps clear away the blocks that keep people from robust health and having what they want in life.
